attributes.action: Immediate ceasefire and stop slaughtering Kurds people in Syria
attributes.additional_details: We formally call for the immediate and unconditional implementation of a ceasefire throughout the territory of Syria and demand an end to all unlawful acts of violence, persecution, and collective punishment directed against the Kurdish people. All parties must comply with their obligations under international humanitarian law and international human rights law.
attributes.background: immediate and unconditional implementation of a ceasefire throughout the territory of Syria and demand an end to all unlawful acts of violence and  punishment directed against the Kurdish people. All parties must comply with their obligations under international humanitarian law.

rejection.details:
Condemn attacks on Kurds in North Syria & use diplomatic pressure to bring peace 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756339

UK must act now & condemn the killing of Kurdish civilians in Rojava & Rojhilat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756419
